title: No Matter How You Slice It

Instructions: Change the input with the buttons in the top right.
The puzzle answers are printed in the console.
Algorithm: Part 1: Each frame, display another claim. At the end count the locations with more than a given brightness.
Part 2: Each frame, check if the current claim has any overlapping part with any other claim.
Display: Because the fabric measurements are 1000x1000, Work directly on the pixels array.
For smaller fabrics, the display is scaled automatically to fill the space available.
